title: Developing Expert Competencies in Learning Experience Design (LXD) Using Mixed Research Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational technology theories and experience utilizing digital tools
context.additional_context: A course to cultivate core LXD (Learning Experience Design) competencies for university students aiming to enter professional fields in healthcare, law, or technology

learning_goals: Can explain and apply the 8 domains of the LXD (Learning Experience Design) KSA (Knowledge, Skills, Abilities) framework to practical cases
Can create a portfolio analyzing LXD job competency requirements using mixed research methods
Can develop two types of learning experience prototypes applying human-centered design principles
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
